titles.title: WHERA Act
A bill to establish a voluntary program that strengthens the economy, public health, and environment of the United States by reducing emissions from wood heaters, and for other purposes.
WHERA Act
Wood Heaters Emissions Reduction Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Energy assistance for the poor and aged

bill.summary:
Wood Heaters Emissions Reduction Act of 2018 or the WHERA Act
This bill requires the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a grant program to provide funding for programs designed to incentivize homeowners to replace old wood heaters with more efficient, cleaner-burning heaters.
